parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Containers

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>  Get array with all magazines from uniform of the given unit.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''uniformMagazines''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit : [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[uniformMagazines]] [[player]];</code>
<br>
<code>[
	"6.5mm 30Rnd STANAG Mag(30/30)[id/cr:1/0](3x)"
]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[vestMagazines]], [[backpackMagazines]], [[soldierMagazines]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
